description: This SDL2 version isn't too bad. The GUI here is perhaps the most visually pleasing. Also, it actually seems to allow for clicking on cities (what a concept!) Overall basically any of the GUIs are worlds better than the crummy GTK version. This one is playable as is the QT version. Steer clear of the GTK version whatever you do!
injouable, illisible et trop de latence en mode solo, un comble.
